name: Firene
declaringWar: I must protect Firene from you, take this!
attacked: I won't let my guard down, for Firene!
introduction: Hey there, Prince Alfred at your service!
neutralHello: Good day to you, how's the empire going?
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
unique: The Flower Who Cares For Everyone

name: Brodia
declaringWar: Brodia would do much better if you were gone.
attacked: I won't let my guard down, for Firene!
defeated: I may have bested me, but you haven't taken my pride...
introduction: I greet you as the crown prince of Brodia. Call me Diamant.
neutralHello: Good day to you, how's the empire going?
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
unique: The Rising Force Of Blackend Steel
